experience.title: Consultant
bullets: Maintained and enhanced Cisco’s internal application (Angular front-end) for managing information about their service lifecycles.
Assisted in integrating SASS and Bower into Maven build process

experience.title: Web Application Developer
bullets: Sole front-end developer for the version 1 of http://fairshare.it/, developed using Backbone.
Sole front-end developer on a web app for use on iPads by AOL advertising sales reps: http://vimeo.com/91459698

Lead developer/architect on a web app for Neighborworks America to allow their customers to create and manage their home-buying or home-owning information and process online. Will be launched in 2015. Created proxy REST APIs in Node/Express to integrate with SalesForce.

experience.title: Software Developer

experience.title: Senior Systems Analyst

Most development done in C#/ASP.NET/SQL Server.

experience.title: Software Developer
bullets: Built and maintained websites for company clients using ASP.NET. This was a part-time, remote consulting gig, as I was traveling with my band at the time.

experience.title: Software Developer
bullets: Worked on a team to integrate the company’s e-commerce application with Great Plains via BizTalk.
Designed and built web services to allow the company to accept fulfillment-only orders from 3rd party vendors.

Lead developer on the company’s Commerce Server/ASP 3.0 e-commerce system. Designed and built enhancements such as the ability for the company to sell and consume downloadable music, to sell any item as a pre-order, and to allow customers to select gift wrapping of purchases.
Helped business expand into new areas by contributing to .NET-related projects to provide fanclub and online ticketing services to clients.
Maintained legacy websites, including the Dave Matthews Band official site, the Dave Matthews Band fanclub site, and the company portal.
